name: Wedding Bash (Read Desc)
description:
Wedding Bash is a game where you play as a butler and have been instructed to make a wedding go perfectly. The Groom and the Bride are scheduled to marry by the end of the day. If you don't do all your chores the wedding will end. But there's more, the groom is currently being threatened with murder, stop the murderous plot by reliving the same day and making little changes in order to make sure his death never happens.

One Love by Keys of Moon | https://soundcloud.com/keysofmoon Attribution 4.0 International (CC BY 4.0) https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/ Music promoted by https://www.chosic.com/

WARNING!!!

The file I attached to this version of wedding bash doesn't work. I have made an actual download version on my Dashboard! If you want to see this project please go and check out that page.
